sql.remarks: Query App and Licence Data by condition

sqls.sql: SELECT distinct oev.LIC_APP_KEY_ID, oev.APPLICATION_ID APPLICATION_ID, oev.application_no, oev.app_type, oev.appStatus appStatus, oev.service_id, oev.APP_CORR_ID APP_CORR_ID, oev.HCI_CODE,oev.HCI_NAME, oev.lic_hci_code,oev.lic_hci_name, oev.BLK_NO,oev.lic_BLK_NO, oev.FLOOR_NO,oev.lic_FLOOR_NO, oev.UNIT_NO,oev.lic_UNIT_NO, oev.app_uen_no,oev.lic_uen_no, oev.STREET_NAME,oev.lic_STREET_NAME, oev.BUILDING_NAME,oev.lic_BUILDING_NAME, oev.POSTAL_CODE,oev.lic_postal_code, oev.EMAIL,oev.LIC_EMAIL, oev.PREM_TYPE,oev.LIC_PREM_TYPE, oev.APP_LICENSEE_ID as APP_LICENSEE_ID, oev.LIC_APP_ID as LIC_APP_ID, oev.LICENCE_ID as LICENCE_ID, oev.licence_no as licence_no, oev.svc_name as svc_name, oev.LicSTATUS as LicSTATUS, oev.start_date as start_date, oev.expiry_date as expiry_date, oev.lic_licensee_id as lic_licensee_id, oev.RISK_SCORE ,oev.LAST_IS_NC ,oev.SEC_IS_NC, oev.APP_LICENSEE_NAME , oev.LIC_LICENSEE_NAME FROM onlineEnquiryView oev WHERE 1=1 <#if licence_status??> AND oev.LicSTATUS = :licence_status</#if> <#if start_date??> AND oev.start_date >= convert(date,:start_date)</#if> <#if start_to_date??> AND oev.start_date <= convert(date,:start_to_date)</#if> <#if expiry_date??> AND oev.expiry_date <= convert(date,:expiry_date)</#if> <#if expiry_start_date??> AND oev.expiry_date >= convert(date,:expiry_start_date)</#if> <#if licence_no??> AND charindex(:licence_no, oev.licence_no )>0</#if> <#if hciCode??> AND (charindex(:hciCode, oev.HCI_CODE )>0 OR charindex(:hciCode, oev.lic_hci_code )>0)</#if> <#if hciName??> AND (charindex(:hciName, oev.HCI_NAME )>0 OR charindex(:hciName, oev.lic_hci_name )>0)</#if> <#if hciStreetName??> AND (charindex(:hciStreetName, oev.STREET_NAME )>0 OR charindex(:hciStreetName, oev.lic_STREET_NAME )>0)</#if> <#if hciPostalCode??> AND (charindex(:hciPostalCode, oev.POSTAL_CODE )>0 OR charindex(:hciPostalCode, oev.lic_postal_code )>0)</#if> <#if svc_name??> AND oev.svc_name = :svc_name</#if> <#if licenseeRegnNo??> AND (charindex( :licenseeRegnNo,oev.LIC_PROF_REG_NO )>0 OR charindex( :licenseeRegnNo,oev.APP_PROF_REG_NO )>0 )</#if> <#if licenseeId??> AND ${licenseeId}</#if> <#if serviceSubTypeName??>AND :serviceSubTypeName = :serviceSubTypeName</#if> <#if appSubStatus_HIV??>AND ${appSubStatus_HIV}</#if> <#if appType??> AND oev.app_type = :appType</#if> <#if appNo??> AND charindex(:appNo, oev.application_no)>0</#if> <#if appStatus??> AND oev.appStatus = :appStatus</#if> <#if appStatus_APPROVED??>AND ${appStatus_APPROVED}</#if> <#if appGrpPmtStatus??> AND oev.PMT_STATUS = :appGrpPmtStatus</#if> <#if subDate??> AND oev.submit_dt >= convert(datetime,:subDate)</#if> <#if toDate??> AND oev.submit_dt <= convert(datetime,:toDate)</#if> <#if personnelName??> AND (charindex(:personnelName, oev.appSvcPerName )>0 OR charindex(:personnelName, oev.appGrpPerName )>0)</#if> <#if personnelId??> AND charindex(:personnelId, oev.ID_NO )>0</#if> <#if personnelRegnNo??> AND (charindex( :personnelRegnNo, oev.LIC_PROF_REG_NO )>0 OR charindex( :personnelRegnNo, oev.APP_PROF_REG_NO )>0 OR charindex( :personnelRegnNo, oev.APP_SVC_PROF_REG_NO )>0)</#if> <#if personnelRole??> AND oev.PSN_TYPE = :personnelRole</#if> <#if svc_ids??> AND oev.service_id in( :svc_ids)</#if> <#if uen_no??>AND (charindex(:uen_no, oev.app_uen_no )>0 OR charindex(:uen_no, oev.lic_uen_no )>0)</#if> <#if licenseeIdNo??>AND (charindex(:licenseeIdNo, oev.app_licensee_id_no )>0 OR charindex(:licenseeIdNo, oev.lic_licensee_id_no )>0)</#if> <#if licenseeName??> AND (charindex(:licenseeName, oev.APP_LICENSEE_NAME )>0 OR charindex(:licenseeName, oev.LIC_LICENSEE_NAME )>0)</#if>

sql.remarks: Query App and Licence Data by condition For CommPool

sqls.sql: SELECT distinct oev.LIC_APP_KEY_ID, oev.APPLICATION_ID APPLICATION_ID, oev.application_no, oev.app_type, oev.appStatus appStatus, oev.service_id, oev.APP_CORR_ID APP_CORR_ID, oev.HCI_CODE,oev.HCI_NAME, oev.lic_hci_code,oev.lic_hci_name, oev.BLK_NO,oev.lic_BLK_NO, oev.FLOOR_NO,oev.lic_FLOOR_NO, oev.UNIT_NO,oev.lic_UNIT_NO, oev.STREET_NAME,oev.lic_STREET_NAME, oev.BUILDING_NAME,oev.lic_BUILDING_NAME, oev.POSTAL_CODE,oev.lic_postal_code, oev.EMAIL,oev.LIC_EMAIL, oev.PREM_TYPE,oev.LIC_PREM_TYPE, oev.APP_LICENSEE_ID as APP_LICENSEE_ID, oev.LIC_APP_ID as LIC_APP_ID, oev.LICENCE_ID as LICENCE_ID, oev.licence_no as licence_no, oev.svc_name as svc_name, oev.LicSTATUS as LicSTATUS, oev.start_date as start_date, oev.expiry_date as expiry_date, oev.lic_licensee_id as lic_licensee_id, oev.RISK_SCORE ,oev.LAST_IS_NC ,oev.SEC_IS_NC, oev.APP_LICENSEE_NAME , oev.LIC_LICENSEE_NAME FROM onlineEnquiryViewForCommPool oev WHERE 1=1 <#if licence_status??> AND oev.LicSTATUS = :licence_status</#if> <#if start_date??> AND oev.start_date >= convert(date,:start_date)</#if> <#if start_to_date??> AND oev.start_date <= convert(date,:start_to_date)</#if> <#if expiry_date??> AND oev.expiry_date <= convert(date,:expiry_date)</#if> <#if expiry_start_date??> AND oev.expiry_date >= convert(date,:expiry_start_date)</#if> <#if licence_no??> AND charindex(:licence_no, oev.licence_no )>0</#if> <#if hciCode??> AND (charindex(:hciCode, oev.HCI_CODE )>0 OR charindex(:hciCode, oev.lic_hci_code )>0)</#if> <#if hciName??> AND (charindex(:hciName, oev.HCI_NAME )>0 OR charindex(:hciName, oev.lic_hci_name )>0)</#if> <#if hciStreetName??> AND (charindex(:hciStreetName, oev.STREET_NAME )>0 OR charindex(:hciStreetName, oev.lic_STREET_NAME )>0)</#if> <#if hciPostalCode??> AND (charindex(:hciPostalCode, oev.POSTAL_CODE )>0 OR charindex(:hciPostalCode, oev.lic_postal_code )>0)</#if> <#if svc_name??> AND oev.svc_name = :svc_name</#if> <#if licenseeRegnNo??> AND (charindex( :licenseeRegnNo,oev.LIC_PROF_REG_NO )>0 OR charindex( :licenseeRegnNo,oev.APP_PROF_REG_NO )>0 )</#if> <#if licenseeId??> AND ${licenseeId}</#if> <#if serviceSubTypeName??>AND :serviceSubTypeName = :serviceSubTypeName</#if> <#if appSubStatus_HIV??>AND ${appSubStatus_HIV}</#if> <#if appType??> AND oev.app_type = :appType</#if> <#if appNo??> AND charindex(:appNo, oev.application_no)>0</#if> <#if appStatus??> AND oev.appStatus = :appStatus</#if> <#if appStatus_APPROVED??>AND ${appStatus_APPROVED}</#if> <#if appGrpPmtStatus??> AND oev.PMT_STATUS = :appGrpPmtStatus</#if> <#if subDate??> AND oev.submit_dt >= convert(datetime,:subDate)</#if> <#if toDate??> AND oev.submit_dt <= convert(datetime,:toDate)</#if> <#if personnelName??> AND (charindex(:personnelName, oev.appSvcPerName )>0 OR charindex(:personnelName, oev.appGrpPerName )>0)</#if> <#if personnelId??> AND charindex(:personnelId, oev.ID_NO )>0</#if> <#if personnelRegnNo??> AND (charindex( :personnelRegnNo, oev.LIC_PROF_REG_NO )>0 OR charindex( :personnelRegnNo, oev.APP_PROF_REG_NO )>0 OR charindex( :personnelRegnNo, oev.APP_SVC_PROF_REG_NO )>0)</#if> <#if personnelRole??> AND oev.PSN_TYPE = :personnelRole</#if> <#if svc_ids??> AND oev.service_id in( :svc_ids)</#if> <#if uen_no??>AND (charindex(:uen_no, oev.app_uen_no )>0 OR charindex(:uen_no, oev.lic_uen_no )>0)</#if> <#if licenseeIdNo??>AND (charindex(:licenseeIdNo, oev.app_licensee_id_no )>0 OR charindex(:licenseeIdNo, oev.lic_licensee_id_no )>0)</#if> <#if licenseeName??> AND (charindex(:licenseeName, oev.APP_LICENSEE_NAME )>0 OR charindex(:licenseeName, oev.LIC_LICENSEE_NAME )>0)</#if>

SELECT distinct lic.id, lic.name, lic.organization_id, lic.postal_code FROM LICENSEE AS lic LEFT JOIN ORGANIZATION org ON org.ID = lic.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT JOIN licensee_individual licInd ON licInd.ID = lic.ID WHERE 1=1 <#if uenNo??> AND charindex( :uenNo,org.UEN_NO )>0</#if> <#if licenseeIdNo??> AND charindex( :licenseeIdNo,licInd.ID_NO )>0</#if> <#if licenseeName??> AND charindex(:licenseeName,lic.NAME )>0</#if>
<#if licenseeId??>AND :licenseeId = :licenseeId</#if> <#if licenseeRegnNo??> AND :licenseeRegnNo = :licenseeRegnNo</#if> <#if id??>AND :id = :id</#if> <#if appType??>AND :appType = :appType</#if> <#if appNo??>AND :appNo = :appNo</#if> <#if appStatus??>AND :appStatus = :appStatus</#if> <#if appGrpPmtStatus??> AND :appGrpPmtStatus = :appGrpPmtStatus</#if> <#if subDate??>AND :subDate = :subDate</#if> <#if toDate??>AND :toDate = :toDate</#if> <#if licence_status??>AND :licence_status = :licence_status</#if> <#if start_date??>AND :start_date = :start_date</#if> <#if start_to_date??>AND :start_to_date = :start_to_date</#if> <#if expiry_date??>AND :expiry_date = :expiry_date</#if> <#if expiry_start_date??>AND :expiry_start_date = :expiry_start_date</#if> <#if licence_no??>AND :licence_no = :licence_no</#if> <#if app_id??>AND :app_id = :app_id</#if> <#if hciCode??>AND :hciCode = :hciCode</#if> <#if hciName??>AND :hciName = :hciName</#if> <#if hciStreetName??>AND :hciStreetName = :hciStreetName</#if> <#if hciPostalCode??>AND :hciPostalCode = :hciPostalCode</#if> <#if personnelName??> AND :personnelName = :personnelName</#if> <#if personnelId??> AND :personnelId = :personnelId</#if> <#if personnelRegnNo??> AND :personnelRegnNo = :personnelRegnNo</#if> <#if personnelRole??> AND :personnelRole = :personnelRole</#if> <#if svc_name??> AND :svc_name = :svc_name</#if> <#if serviceSubTypeName??>AND :serviceSubTypeName = :serviceSubTypeName</#if>

sql.remarks: new Request For Information add doc Html
new Request For Information add info Html
